comment: /**  * Returns the global {@link SSLContextParameters} if enabled on the implementing object, null otherwise.  */
code: /**  * Returns the global {@link SSLContextParameters} if enabled on the implementing object, null otherwise.  */ default SSLContextParameters retrieveGlobalSslContextParameters() {     if (isUseGlobalSslContextParameters()) {         return getCamelContext().getSSLContextParameters().     }     return null. }

comment: /**  * Determine if the implementing object is using global SSL context parameters.  */
code: /**  * Determine if the implementing object is using global SSL context parameters.  */ boolean isUseGlobalSslContextParameters().

comment: /**  * Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.  */
code: /**  * Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.  */ void setUseGlobalSslContextParameters(boolean useGlobalSslContextParameters).
